ygData.subject: RE: [sg-everquest] Short-break from EQ
ygData.msgSnippet: Wah liao, cancel EQ?  I thot u will come back in near future ;( Yeah, UO now have LOTS and LOTS of changes, giving players more controls over their chars (eg
ygData.messageBody:
Wah liao, cancel EQ? I thot u will come back in near future ;(

Yeah, UO now have LOTS and LOTS of changes, giving players more controls
over their chars (eg it's now possible to make 7gms char as u can decide
which skills to lock, which to rise, which to drop etc).

The new land is coming out, it's a mirror image of the existing land but
pvp- (ie no pking). Everyone gonna have enuff place to put their houses
(of coz in time to come, land will get scare again but this time they going
to implement 1 house per acct per shard).

Lots of exciting changes now, plus a party system coming up. UO has learn
alot from EQ and given the fact that it has more RP elements than EQ, I
believe it's gonna rock!

As for UO2, I'm not putting any hope on it. If I want 1st person 3D online
RPG, I will stick to EQ. If take abt 3rd person 3D, I will stay on with UO
;)



On Tuesday, 04 April, 2000 6:31 PM, Wilson [SMTP:ritzbits@...]
wrote:
> Hail thee!
> I just cancelled my EQ account.
> UO changed much eversince my one year absence.
> Might be getting back in UO...but ah...when's UO2 comin' out?
>
> Regards,
> Wilson
>

> From: LKW <leekw13@...>
>

will

> patch

like

up

> blocked

land.
> >
> > Wish me good luck in searching a wonder nice place to put up in UO :)
> >
> > Ziltus (aka Dark Flame, Armageddon Warlord, The Dark Wardens, Baja
Shard)
